column4: How do I remove Firefox 3.0 from my system? I cannot seem to do it
When is that coming out? I seem to recall every 6 months or something
Alright. I will keep.  Thank you guys
My Firefox icon on top still directs me to 3.0.14 and I only know how to access 3.5 from CL.  How do I replace that icon with 3.5 shortcut?
K, thanks
right click on your FF icon and click properties, then change the icon but if you remove 3.0 you wont have the FF icon to use with 3.5
you can also set FF-3.5 as default in System>Prefs>Preferred Applications
in the properties for FF change the command to firefox-3.5 %u
it should be in your Applications menu
check out IDJC
patience is a virtue
Synaptic Package Manager in System> Admin...
IDJC has a website with FAQ
please do not dcc chat me. if you have question ask in the channel
you can also try asking in #ubuntustudio
/join #ubuntustudio
can you give me a name of a windows application you would use to do what you want?
I'll do a little searching and see if I can find an equivalent
something to make beats with
sudo apt-get install lmms
if you prefer a GUI way. System > Adminstration > Synaptic Package Manager, search for lmms and then install it by checking the box to the left of it and click apply
Hydrogen can also be installed with Synaptic
